sentences.en: An item of prominence on the conference agenda was infant health care.
sentences.cn: 会议议程上的一项重要议题是婴儿保健.

sentences.en: Education, quite rightly, is currently at the forefront of the political agenda.
sentences.cn: 目前教育被排在政治议程的首位，这样做非常恰当。

sentences.en: His agenda is discordant with ours.
sentences.cn: 他的日程安排和我们的有冲突。

sentences.en: I move that we adopt the agenda as It'stands.
sentences.cn: 我提议不作改变通过这个议程.

sentences.en: It was Mann who structured the agenda for maximum efficiency.
sentences.cn: 是曼制定这个取得最大效率的议程的.

sentences.en: Officials tussled over who had responsibility for the newly fashionable unemployment agenda.
sentences.cn: 众官员为谁负责最近备受关注的失业议题一事争得不可开交。

sentences.en: Politics is most emphatically back on the agenda.
sentences.cn: 政治问题显然重新提上了日程。

sentences.en: the antepenultimate item on the agenda
The Danish president will put environmental issues high on the agenda.
sentences.cn: 丹麦总统将试图把环境问题摆到重要位置上。

sentences.en: The Macedonian question had failed to get on to the agenda.
sentences.cn: 马其顿问题没能列入议事日程。

sentences.en: The next item on the agenda is the publicity budget.
sentences.cn: 议程表上的下一项是宣传预算。

sentences.en: The Republicans have stuck to their conservative agenda.
sentences.cn: 共和党人坚持自己的保守议题。

sentences.en: the rights of minorities would be high on the agenda at the conference.
sentences.cn: 少数民族权利问题会是大会的重要议程。

sentences.en: There are fears of a hidden agenda behind this new proposal.
sentences.cn: 人们担心这一新提议的背后有不可告人的目的。

sentences.en: There are four items on the agenda of the meeting.
This is sure to be an item on the agenda next week.
sentences.cn: 这必将成为下周议事日程上的一项议题。

sentences.en: What's on your agenda for tomorrow?
sentences.cn: 你明天的日程是怎么安排的?

sentences.en: What's the next item on the agenda?

phrases.tran_cn: 隐秘的议程；幕后的动机

trans.tran_en: a list of problems or subjects that a government, organization etc is planning to deal with
